concept.title: Platform Services and Web Service APIs

section.p: An application that integrates with invokes the functionality of the platform services.
In addition, the integration package contains APIs for implementing a provisioning service, an operation service, or a notification service.
The subsequent sections describe the platform services and APIs in detail.

ships the Java interfaces for its Web services as .jar files. You can directly write your Java code and include these .jar files for calls from to the application (outbound calls), or implement the Java interfaces for calls from the application to (inbound calls). No code generation is required. Both call directions can be deployed in Java EE environments.
The available REST APIs are described in YAML files which are shipped with . With appropriate tools such as Swagger Editor, you can view the descriptions and collect experience with the APIs.
